9138.name: Santa's Hat
9138.description: Santa's Hat, which is made to celebrate the holy day. Uses 2 hair accessory slots.

9139.name: Santa's Hat
9139.description: Santa's Hat, which is made to celebrate the holy day.

9140.name: Salvation Bow
9140.description: Shoots a harmless heart-tipped arrow and allows use of the Forgiveness active skill. (Warning: If you use this skill against a monster, you will be flagged for PvP.) Forgiveness

9141.name: Redemption Bow
9141.description: Event item. Send a heart with love to select mutated creatures. The active skills "Heart Shot" and "Double Heart Shot" can be used. Forgiveness

9142.name: Apiga
9142.description: Money used by cursed creatures. Take it to a magic lab for a reward.

9143.name: Golden Apiga
9143.description: Rare money used by cursed creatures. Depending on the amount, you may use these to earn a reward in a lottery. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

9144.name: Pirate's Booty
9144.description: One can receive Golden Apigas with a certain rate of chance by double clicking. If you are unlucky, you won't receive anything. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.) Pig Chest

9145.name: Little Angel Wings (Event)
9145.description: A wing-shaped hair accessory. This item is designed for use in events and cannot be exchanged or dropped.

9146.name: Scroll of Guidance (Event)
9146.description: Accuracy increases. Event reward item. Guidance Scroll - Event Use

9147.name: Scroll of Death Whisper (Event)
9147.description: Critical Damage increases. Event reward item. Death Whisper Scroll - Event Use

9148.name: Scroll of Focus (Event)
9148.description: Critical Rate increases. Event reward item. Focus Scroll - Event Use

9149.name: Scroll of Acumen (Event)
9149.description: Spell Casting Spd. increases. Event reward item. Scroll of Acumen - Event Use

9150.name: Scroll of Haste (Event)
9150.description: Atk. Spd. increases. Event reward item. Haste Scroll - Event Use

9151.name: Scroll of Agility (Event)
9151.description: Increases Evasion. Event reward item. Agility Scroll - Event Use

9152.name: Scroll of Empower (Event)
9152.description: M. Atk. increases. Event reward item. Scroll of Empower - Event Use

9153.name: Scroll of Might (Event)
9153.description: P. Atk. increases. Event reward item. Might Scroll - Event Use

9154.name: Scroll of Wind Walk (Event)
9154.description: Speed increases. Event reward item. Wind Walk Scroll - Event Use

9155.name: Scroll of Shield (Event)
9155.description: P. Def. increases. Event reward item. Shield Scroll - Event Use

9156.name: Blessed Scroll of Escape - Event
9156.description: A magical scroll that relocates user to the nearest village. An event reward. Blessed Scroll of Escape - Event Use

9157.name: Blessed Scroll of Resurrection - Event
9157.description: A magic scroll that resurrects a dead character and restores his or her Exp. completely. An event reward. Blessed Scroll of Resurrection - Event Use

9158.name: Gold Circlet of Redemption
9158.description: Golden Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Event item.

9159.name: Silver Circlet of Salvation
9159.description: Silver Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Event item.

9160.name: Pig Wrangler's Cap
9160.description: Top hat made of leather. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Event item.

9161.name: Santa's Antlers
9161.description: Festive Santa hat with antlers. Ideal for celebrating the holidays. This item can only be equipped during the year end.

9162.name: Red Philosopher's Stone Transmutation Circle
9162.description: Usable by all races. Double-click to add the Red Philosopher's Stone Transmutation Circle to your Recipe Book. Requires Create Item - Level 1. The success rate is 100%.

9163.name: Blue Philosopher's Stone Transmutation Circle
9163.description: Usable by all races. Double-click to add the Blue Philosopher's Stone Transmutation Circle to your Recipe Book. Requires Create Item - Level 1. The success rate is 100%.

9168.name: Philosopher's Stone Ore
9168.description: A material used to create a colored Philosopher's Stone.

9169.name: Philosopher's Stone Conversion Formula
9169.description: A material used to create a colored Philosopher's Stone.

9170.name: Magic Reagents
9170.description: A material used to create a colored Sage's Stone.

9171.name: Red Philosopher's Stone
9171.description: Double-click to get a random item. Red Sage's Stone
